item.title: Anthropic Plans To Invest $50 Billion To Build Data Centers Across US
item.description: The AI startup said that the facilities will be custom-built for Anthropic, designed to optimize the company’s AI workloads and accelerate research an...

item.title: Synopsys To Cut 10% Of Workforce After Ansys Acquisition
item.description: The move aims to streamline operations and focus resources on strategic growth areas following its recent acquisition of ANSYS Inc.

item.title: Toyota Commits Up To $10B Additional Investments In US Over Five Years
item.description: The company also kick-started production at its all-new $14 billion battery plant in Liberty, North Carolina, on Wednesday.

item.title: Uber COO Says Robotaxi Tech Is Largely Ready But Hardware Costs Are Still Too High
item.description: Uber has partnerships in place with multiple robotaxi companies, including Pony AI, WeRide and Alphabet Inc’s Waymo.

item.title: OpenAI Accuses Times Of Overreach In Demand For 20 Million Private ChatGPT Conversations
item.description: The company called the demand unreasonable and a threat to user privacy.
